ModMetaData.name: Project RimFactory Revived - Autopsy Machine (OP Patch)
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description: ABOUT Patches some aspects of the Autopsy Machine to make it stupidly overpowered. - Work range can be overclocked up to 256 tiles, which is enough to cover the entirety of a normal sized map. - Increasing the range now uses an extra 5W of power per step instead of 200. - Increasing the work speed now uses an extra 50W of power per step instead of 250.
